subdisciplines.name: Egyptian art
subdisciplines.description: The study of the art and artistic culture of ancient Egypt.

subdisciplines.name: Egyptian architecture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the architecture and building techniques of ancient Egypt.

subdisciplines.name: Egyptian language
subdisciplines.description: The study of the hieroglyphic and other forms of writing used by ancient Egyptians.

subdisciplines.name: Egyptian religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of the religious beliefs, practices and mythology of ancient Egypt.
